9.question: Originally, the creators of the show intended for Spock to be from Mars. Later, however, they changed it to Vulcan. Why?
9.a: They thought it was too similar to George Welles' novel War of the Worlds
9.b: They thought that humans would walk on Mars soon after the show was launched
9.c: They wanted something more exotic than a planet from our Solar System
9.d: At the time of the creation of Star Trek they knew Mars was basically a desert
9.e: If men were from Mars, the women would have to be from Venus

10.question: Where was James T. Kirk born?
10.d: He was born in space onboard the USS Farragut
